name: Why does the sea cry so much?
name_original: Why does the sea cry so much?
description:
This visual novel was done during Inktober.  Inktober is an event that happens every year during October, in which artists challenge themselves to make one drawing in ink every day for the entire month. The challenge became more popular and many people started doing Inktober digitally.  I decided I would create one piece of art for this visual novel every day during October instead of a traditional Inktober.  Since Inktober started with ink and most art was black and white, I decided to keep most of the art in this game black and white.  The entire process was documented in my YouTube Channel and my Tiktok in the form of short videos, so please check them out if you're interested in seeing the whole process!

Support this game!

If you want to support this game or my art, you can donate on this page by clicking at the "Download Now" button and naming your own price! I really appreciate it!

If you can't donate, don't worry. You can always support me and the whole Wizard of Ox team by following our social media. I'm also including the social media of our musician since he provided the theme song for this game!
